verses.text: \w These|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* words \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* agreement \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w ordered|strong="H0559"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* children \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Moab, \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w addition|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* agreement \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* Horeb.

\w And|strong="H1419"\w* Moses said \w in|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* hearing \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w all|strong="H1419"\w* Israel, \w You|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Lord \w did|strong="H0834"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w your|strong="H0834"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w in|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* land \w of|strong="H5869"\w* Egypt \w to|strong="H7200"\w* Pharaoh \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H1419"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* servants \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w all|strong="H1419"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* land;

\w The|strong="H8085"\w* great tests \w which|strong="H5869"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* signs \w and|strong="H3068"\w* wonders:

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* this day \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w has|strong="H7272"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* given \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w mind|strong="H3808"\w* open \w to|strong="H5921"\w* knowledge, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* seeing eyes \w or|strong="H3808"\w* hearing ears.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* forty years \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* guide \w through|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* waste land: \w your|strong="H3068"\w* clothing \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* become old \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* backs, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* shoes \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* feet.

\w You|strong="H0935"\w* \w have|strong="H4428"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* no bread, \w or|strong="H4421"\w* wine, \w or|strong="H4421"\w* strong drink: \w so|strong="H3318"\w* \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \w you|strong="H0935"\w* \w might|strong="H4725"\w* \w see|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* am \w the|strong="H0413"\w* Lord \w your|strong="H0935"\w* \w God|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w When|strong="H0776"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* came \w to|strong="H5414"\w* this \w place|strong="H5414"\w*, Sihon, king \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Heshbon, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* Og, king \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Bashan, came \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* war against \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w we|strong="H0776"\w* overcame \w them|strong="H5414"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1697"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w took|strong="H0853"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* land \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w gave|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Reubenites \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Gadites \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* half-tribe \w of|strong="H1697"\w* Manasseh, \w for|strong="H4616"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* heritage.

\w So|strong="H6440"\w* keep \w the|strong="H3605"\w* words \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* agreement \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w so|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* well \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w You|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* come here today, \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w of|strong="H0802"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, \w before|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Lord \w your|strong="H0834"\w* God; \w the|strong="H0834"\w* heads \w of|strong="H0802"\w* \w your|strong="H0834"\w* tribes, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* overseers, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w those|strong="H0834"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0802"\w* authority \w over|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, \w with|strong="H0802"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w men|strong="H4264"\w* \w of|strong="H0802"\w* Israel,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* little ones, \w your|strong="H3068"\w* wives, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w men|strong="H3772"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* other lands \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* tents, \w down|strong="H3772"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* wood-cutter \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* servant \w who|strong="H0834"\w* gets water \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*:

\w With|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w purpose|strong="H4616"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* taking \w part|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* agreement \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w your|strong="H0834"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w makes|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1285"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H1285"\w* \w make|strong="H3772"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* today, \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w as|strong="H0595"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H0854"\w* said \w to|strong="H0854"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w as|strong="H0595"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w an|strong="H3772"\w* \w oath|strong="H0423"\w* \w to|strong="H0854"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* fathers, Abraham, Isaac, \w and|strong="H1285"\w* Jacob.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* only \w do|strong="H0369"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* agreement \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* oath;

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* everyone \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* here \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w* today \w before|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w our|strong="H3588"\w* God, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w well|strong="H3045"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w those|strong="H0834"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* here:

(\w For|strong="H6086"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0068"\w* mind \w how|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* living \w in|strong="H0068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* land \w of|strong="H6086"\w* Egypt; \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w how|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* came \w through|strong="H7200"\w* all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* nations \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H0834"\w* way;

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* seen \w their|strong="H3068"\w* disgusting doings, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* images \w of|strong="H0376"\w* wood \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w stone|strong="H0834"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* silver \w and|strong="H3068"\w* gold \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*:)

\w So|strong="H4616"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w among|strong="H0854"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H6771"\w* \w or|strong="H8085"\w* woman \w or|strong="H8085"\w* family \w or|strong="H8085"\w* tribe whose \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w turned|strong="H1961"\w* \w away|strong="H5595"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w our|strong="H1961"\w* \w God|strong="H0559"\w* today, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w go|strong="H1961"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* other gods \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w give|strong="H8085"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* worship; \w or|strong="H8085"\w* \w any|strong="H1961"\w* root \w among|strong="H0854"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* whose fruit \w is|strong="H3820"\w* poison \w and|strong="H1697"\w* bitter sorrow;

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, hearing \w the|strong="H3605"\w* words \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w oath|strong="H0423"\w*, takes comfort \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* thought \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* peace \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* goes \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* pride \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* heart, taking \w whatever|strong="H3605"\w* chance \w may|strong="H0376"\w* give \w him|strong="H0853"\w*:

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w but|strong="H0423"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wrath \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* burning \w against|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w curses|strong="H0423"\w* \w recorded|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* waiting \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* take \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* name \w completely|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth.

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* marked \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* tribes \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Israel, \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w an|strong="H7200"\w* evil fate, \w in|strong="H0935"\w* keeping \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* curses \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* agreement recorded \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* book \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* law.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* future generations, \w your|strong="H3068"\w* children \w coming|strong="H5927"\w* \w after|strong="H0776"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* travellers \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w far|strong="H3605"\w* \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*, \w will|strong="H3068"\w* say, \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w see|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* punishments \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* diseases \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H5927"\w* \w on|strong="H0776"\w* \w it|strong="H2015"\w*;

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H2088"\w* salt \w and|strong="H3068"\w* smoking waste, \w not|strong="H2088"\w* planted \w or|strong="H1471"\w* giving \w fruit|strong="H3605"\w* \w or|strong="H1471"\w* clothed \w with|strong="H3068"\w* grass, \w but|strong="H0559"\w* wasted \w like|strong="H0776"\w* Sodom \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Gomorrah, Admah \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Zeboiim, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H0559"\w* destruction \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* heat \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w*:

Truly all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w nations|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Why|strong="H0834"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* done \w so|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*? \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w reason|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w* \w great|strong="H0430"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* burning wrath?

\w Then|strong="H3045"\w* men \w will|strong="H0430"\w* say, \w Because|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* gave up \w the|strong="H0834"\w* agreement \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Lord, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H5647"\w* fathers, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w them|strong="H5647"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w took|strong="H3045"\w* \w them|strong="H5647"\w* \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* land \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Egypt:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w other|strong="H2088"\w* gods \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w gave|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* worship, gods \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H0776"\w* strange \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* whom \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* given \w them|strong="H0853"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* moved \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* send \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* curse recorded \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* book:

Rooting \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* land, \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* heat \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* wrath \w and|strong="H1121"\w* passion, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* driving \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w into|strong="H1540"\w* another land, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* day.
The secret things are the Lord our God's: but the things which have been made clear are ours and our children's for ever, so that we may do all the words of this law.
